name: iexec-market-watcher
description: watch iexec contract to keep offchain ordebook up to date

scripts.test: npm run test-token && npm run test-native
scripts.test-token: echo 'RUNNING TESTS ON TOKEN CHAIN' && DEBUG=iexec-watcher* CHAIN=TOKEN CHAIN_ID=65535 IEXEC_ADDRESS=0xC129e7917b7c7DeDfAa5Fff1FB18d5D7050fE8ca ETH_RPC_HOST=http://localhost:8545 ETH_WS_HOST=http://localhost:8546 MONGO_HOST=localhost REDIS_HOST=localhost jest watcher-common --runInBand --forceExit --detectOpenHandles --coverage
scripts.test-token-enterprise: echo 'RUNNING TESTS ON TOKEN ENTERPRISE CHAIN' && DEBUG=iexec-watcher* CHAIN=TOKEN_ENTERPRISE FLAVOUR=enterprise CHAIN_ID=65535 IEXEC_ADDRESS=0xb80C02d24791fA92fA8983f15390274698A75D23 ETH_RPC_HOST=http://localhost:8545 ETH_WS_HOST=http://localhost:8546 MONGO_HOST=localhost REDIS_HOST=localhost jest watcher-common watcher-enterprise --runInBand --forceExit --detectOpenHandles --coverage
